name: ROTATEQ
treatmentDescriptions: RotaTeq  is indicated for the prevention of rotavirus gastroenteritis in infants and children caused by types G1, G2, G3, G4, and G9 when administered as a 3-dose series to infants between the ages of 6 to 32 weeks. The first dose of RotaTeq should be administered between 6 and 12 weeks of age.
ingredients: ROTAVIRUS P1A(8) REASSORTANT 1.15 X10^6 IU/ML, ROTAVIRUS G2 REASSORTANT 1.4 X10^6 IU/ML, ROTAVIRUS G4 REASSORTANT 1.0 X10^6   IU/ML, ROTAVIRUS G3 REASSORTANT 1.1 X10^6 IU/ML, ROTAVIRUS G1 REASSORTANT 1.1 X10^6 IU/ML
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
